name: Infoblox DDI
description: Infoblox DDI Project has assets for Create Network, Create Network Container, Create DNS A Record, Create CNS CNAME Record, Create DNS Fixed Address Record, Create DNS NS Record, Create DNS PRT Record

ee17.name: assignNextIP2
ee17.description: assignNextIP2 will register the IP in the system

incoming.body: The PTR record for <!ipv4addr!>/<!ptrdname!> was not found in Infoblox.
The NS record for <!name!>/<!nameserver!> was not found in Infoblox.
The fixed address record for <!ipv4addr!>/<!mac!> was not found in Infoblox.

d778.name: evaluation
d778.summary: Check if Fixed Address Record _ref Exists
d778.description: Check if fixed address record _ref exists

incoming.body: The CNAME record for <!name!>/<!canonical!> was not found in Infoblox.
The DNS A record for <!ipv4addr!>/<!name!> was not found in Infoblox.

1261.name: getNetworkContainerDetails
1261.description: getNetworkContainerDetails will get the container details

incoming.body: Network container was not found in Infoblox.

The NS record for <!name!>/<!nameserver!> was not found in Infoblox.

incoming.body: The CNAME record for <!name!>/<!canonical!> was not found in Infoblox.

f30c.name: createNetworkContainer
f30c.description: createNetworkContainer will create a new network container

976e.name: merge
976e.summary: Build Input to Create Network Container
976e.description: Builds input to create network container

8a5a.name: createPtrRecord
8a5a.description: Creates a PTR record, e.g. for 'server1' in the zone 'info.com'

c0e5.name: createNsRecord
c0e5.description: Creates a NS record, e.g. for the zone 'info.com'

e19f.name: createCNAMERecord
e19f.description: Creates a cname record, e.g. 'cnametest.demo' in the zone 'info.com' with a canonical name 'demo'
